pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diverse Basic Statistical and Graphical Functions // Contains diverse more or less complicated functions, written to simplify user's life: simplifications of existing functions, basic but not implemented tests, easy-to-use tools, bridges between functions of different packages... All functions are presented in the French book 'Aide-memoire de statistique appliquee a la biologie', written by the same author and available on CRAN.
